name: Mage Unchained
description:
An evil wizard turns their imprisonment into an instrument of chaos.

Created by leauxgan1, DishonoredHeir, and myself for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Mage & orb art by Athena Kieu

Spells (1-5):

  1. Make the orb weightless and pushable/pullable.
  2. Shoot the orb in its current direction of movement.
  3. Set the orb aflame, dealing damage over time to anyone it touches
  4. Attract all nearby enemies in an implosion
  5. Repel all nearby enemies in an explosion

Controls: WASD to move, LSHIFT to control the orb, 1-5 for spell
